comment: Billions of things to memorize. No teaching in class. No reviews. Tons of homework. Be ready to teach yourselves and fail.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Mr. Dehner was alright. He tried to make the class interesting and put in a lot of grades to help boost your grade. The class itself was a waste of my time and money. As a Com major I was required to take this course as a prereq. and I will never use half of the things I learned in this class again (Motherboards, RAM, Decoding, HTML). Try hard  B.
